items.sentence: Tom said he had something to take care of, and left.
Mary is the only woman I\'ve ever been in love with.
Tom woke up a few minutes before his alarm went off.
Tom kissed Mary on the neck just below her left ear.
Aren\'t you going to tell me what this is all about?
Why do you keep saying things you know aren\'t true?
I hope that next time will be better than last time.
Have you been back to Australia since you graduated?
I can read French, but I\'m not good at speaking it.
Tom asked Mary to meet him at John\'s house at 2:30.
